Entity.name: Subsidiary, joint venture and associate
Entity.commentInRDBMS: A Subsidiary, joint venture and associate is an Internal group comprising all Subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates according the following definitions: subsidiary: An entity that is controlled by another entity (see International Financial Reporting Standard (IFRS) 10: Consolidated Financial Statement, Appendix A Defined terms) joint venture: A joint venture is a joint arrangement whereby the parties that have joint control of the arrangement have rights to the net assets of the arragement (see International Accounting Standard (IAS) 28: Investments in Associates and Joint Venturs (3)) associate: An associate is an entity over which the investor has significant influence (see International Accounting Standard (IAS) 28: Investments in Associates and Joint Venturs (3))
